name: Three Point Contest - My Basketball Team
name_original: Three Point Contest - My Basketball Team
description:
🏀Dear fans, it's time to show off your shooting skills and take on new challenges in a brand new MBT app. Join the three-point contest and do your best to become a master in “three point shooting” basketball games. Compete with other players, practice your skills, and achieve great scores in our free basketball games! Hurry up, the clock is ticking! Your time limit is 60 seconds! Try to get as many scores as you can and earn your spot on the leaderboard. Only in 🏆Three Point Contest - My Basketball Team🏆!

🏆 Another great addition to your favorite basketball manager game!
🏆 Compete in a three point contest!
🏆 Log in or continue as a guest;
🏆 Play as your team and choose your players;
🏆 Shoot as many 3 pointers as you can within the time limit;
🏆 Move from one position to another along the three point line;
🏆 A huge number of levels;
🏆 Get your stats after the game: hi-score, points, shots, moneyballs, time left;
🏆 Show your talent and be prepared to be applauded!
🏆 Dominate the leaderboards!
🏆 Take the first step on your way to becoming the greatest “basketball manager” – download 🏆Three Point Contest - “My Basketball Team”🏆 app now!

🏀 Time for some addicting three point challenges! Are you in for some real basketball competition? How many points can you make before the time runs out? You won't know until you try! Download this awesome basketball manager game and make as many jumps as you can in this classic “three point shootout”. Lead your team, choose players and compete in “three point shooting” competitions. Shoot as many 3 pointers as you can within the time limit. Let yourself be known! Get your stats after the game and try to dominate the leaderboards! Only in one of the best basketball apps for coaches and players.

🏀 For all fans of “three point shooting”! Do you think you can make it from the behind the line, with the clock ticking away and the positions changing? 🏆Three Point Contest - My Basketball Team🏆 features a familiar control that allows players to move around the court and shoot from behind the arc. “Basketball players” begin shooting from one corner of the court, and move from one position to another along the three point arc until they reach the other corner. The goal of this contest is to score as many points as possible within one minute. Test your skills with this realistic 3D game while you work your way through a huge number of levels – in one of the best “three point basketball games”.

🏀 Practice to become the greatest “basketball manager” and build your team's spirit with scoring as many points in this fantastic three point contest game! Show your talent and be prepared to be applauded while climbing to the top of the leaderboard through many challenging levels. Feel free to show your shooting and basketball skills and earn as many points as you can. 🏆Three Point Contest – MBT🏆 is right here at your disposal, so download it right now and let the games begin! Good luck in getting the best score!
